Module org.nasdanika.ncore
Package org.nasdanika.ncore

Interface Period

All Superinterfaces:
Adaptable, org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, Marked, Marked, ModelElement, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier
All Known Implementing Classes:
PeriodImpl
public interface Period extends ModelElement
A representation of the model object 'Period'.

The following features are supported:

  • Start
  • End
  • Duration
See Also:
  • NcorePackage.getPeriod()

    • getDuration

      Duration getDuration()
      Returns the value of the 'Duration' attribute. Positive period duration in [ISO-8601 durations](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Durations) format. E.g. ``P1M`` for one month or ``P20D`` for 20 days.
      Returns:
      the value of the 'Duration' attribute.
      See Also:
      • setDuration(Duration)
      • NcorePackage.getPeriod_Duration()
